recipetext.li: Pur some water over the breadcrumbs and let it soak in for while. Cut the onion and garlic in small pieces.
Now put the ground beef in a bowl and add the egg, onion, garlic, watered breadcrumbs and the spices, salt, pepper, and paprika.
Mix it all well together and form them into balls. Fry them on medium high heat in butter and olive oil until done
